properties.entry: INSERT INTO POINT_HISTORY(PH_ID, USERNO, ORDER_ID, POINT_DIFF, REG_DATE, MEMO) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?)
SELECT PH_ID, USERNO, ORDER_ID, POINT_DIFF, REG_DATE, MEMO FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE USERNO = ? ORDER BY PH_ID DESC
UPDATE MEMBER SET POINT_BALANCE = POINT_BALANCE + ? WHERE USERNO = ?
